attributes.action: Limit rail fare increases to inflation only
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the automatic right for train companies to increase their fares above the rate of inflation.

Some areas will see increases of more than 10%, yet based on past performance to date, there is likely to be very little visible improvement in services to justify this.

At a time when thousands of workers have been made redundant or have received pay cuts, it's about time that the train companies stopped being so profit greedy and instead re-invested any profit rather than relying on an automatic fare increase.
